description.ko: 유기적 생명체와 디지털 데이터의 경계를 시각적으로 탐구한 작품으로, 햇빛 대신 전자기 주파수를 먹고 자라는 플로라-9 표본을 묘사합니다.
description.en: A visual exploration of the boundary between organic life and digital data, where the FLORA-9 specimen thrives on electromagnetic frequencies instead of sunlight.

prompt: A high-tech bioluminescent flower named FLORA-9, featuring translucent crystalline petals with integrated fiber-optic veins, growing from a dark metallic motherboard landscape, holographic particles floating around the bloom, neon cyan and violet lighting, 8k resolution, hyper-realistic, digital nature aesthetic.
